title: Increase height of selected inner card in 'Why SweetSteps' carousel to prevent text clipping

requirements.text: In the “Why SweetSteps?” modal carousel on the Landing page, increase the rendered height of the specific selected element (XPath: /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[2]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]) so that the feature description text is not cut off. Apply the change ONLY to the element corresponding to that XPath (e.g., by adjusting that element’s Tailwind height/min-height/padding/overflow behavior) and do not modify surrounding carousel layout/styling beyond what is strictly necessary.

quotes: In the Why SweetSteps carousel, can you please increase the height of this inner card, as some text is getting cut off

acceptanceCriteria: When opening “Why SweetSteps?” on the Landing page and navigating through all carousel slides, no slide’s title or description text is visually clipped/cut off.
The selected element is visibly taller than before and provides enough vertical space for the longest description at common breakpoints (mobile and desktop).
No unexpected scrollbars appear inside the card/selected element as a result of the height change.
Carousel navigation (Previous/Next buttons, dot indicators, slide transitions) continues to work and looks unchanged aside from the increased height of the selected element.
Only the element corresponding to the provided XPath has its styling adjusted; other components and pages remain unchanged.

constraints: Frontend changes must be limited to the single element identified by XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[2]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1].
Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only shadcn components).
nonGoals: Do not redesign the carousel or change copy/content of the slides.
Do not add new features or backend changes for this request.
